description: The rooCASE Executive Leather Case for Amazon Kindle Fire provides comfortable viewing angles for your Kindle Fire Tablet. This Case features a built-in stand to provide a 45-degree viewing angle of your Kindle Fire and it even allows you to view your tablet in a landscape or portrait view as it features a detachable inner sleeve. Business, ID slots with accessory flap, and elastic loop are included to further add convenience to your mobile computing.
title: rooCASE Executive Portfolio (Black) Leather Case Cover with Landscape / Portrait View for Amazon Kindle Fire 7-Inch Android Tablet (NOT Compatible with Fire HD)
